posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy or trade 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamps.  Specifically, I'm looking to buy or trade for the following:

Al Bridwell
Bill Dahlen
Clyde Engle
William Goode (Wilbur Good)
Harry Lord
George Moriarty
Freddy Parent
Kaiser Wilhelm

That said, I am interested in front/back combinations as well (Factory 25 vs. Factory 42), so let me know what you've got and maybe we can make a match!

I have about 60 available for trade/sale if any suit your fancy.  

[url]https://imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras[/url]

Here are a few images of Piedmont Art Stamps I have available for sale/trade to whet your appetite - Johnson is now SOLD:

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Brown%2025%20_extra%202_.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Johnson%2042%20_extra_.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Snodgrass%2025.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras/websize/1914%20Snodgrass%2025%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="eliotdeutsch" post=2155957]Sent pm[/QUOTE]

Eliot - thanks for an easy and smooth transaction!  Enjoy your purchase!

bump.  Still looking to trade or buy.  

I'd also be willing to sell any of the Piedmont Stamps in the following link:
[url]https://imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1914piedmontstampextras[/url]

These include:
Ames, Archer, Barger, Barry, Becker, Bender, Birmingham, Brown, Camnitz, Chase, Cicotte, Crandall, Delahanty, Devore, Dooin, Downey, Doyle, Ford, Fromme, Grant, Griffith, Groom, Herzog, Huggins, Jones, Knight, Marquard, Milan, Mitchell, Moran, Mullin, Murray, Oakes, Oldring, Paskert, Quinn, Reulbach, Ritchie, Rowan, Snodgrass, Stanage, Stovall, Suggs, Sweeney, Vaughn, Wallace, Willett, Wilson

I'd also entertain trades/sales of any of the 52x 1911 T332 Helmar Stamps in the following link:
[url]https://imageevent.com/derekgranger/baseballstamps/1911helmarstampsextras[/url]

I got my stamps, thank you !
 I'm Interested in your Yankee's that you have left . Knight, Quinn and Vaughn. please let know if you still have them and how much ?
Thanks again'
Gary
